siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Back to school at home
frontmatter.description: New routines will evolve. School will continue. Kids will learn.

frontmatter.title: Self sufficient habits
frontmatter.description: Tomorrow is back to school. Whether it's one or two kids, my attention must be with them.

frontmatter.title: The longest school year awaits
frontmatter.description: This will be the longest year regardless of setting. It looks unlikely to have in-person this year. Schedules change. We adjust. It will be a long year.

frontmatter.title: What comes in next stage of pandemic
frontmatter.description: summer quickly fades. school begins with questions amiss. as to what comes next

frontmatter.title: Anticipate short notice changes
frontmatter.description: Expect shot-notice changes. Make contingency plans. Don't get stuck without a plan.
